title: CHIVAS "Live with Chivalry" font
content:
So, i have been in identifont trying to find it with no luck... anybody knows it? It is used throughout the piece  
Thanks in advance.. :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Info Hombres.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150124063803/http:/typophile.com/files/Info%20Hombres.jpg) | 161.31 KB |
author: dust

comments.content:
Looks like [CG Triplett Light](http://web.archive.org/) or something very similar.

Don
Spot on, thanks Ryuk, you are always very helpful! :)
Don, it is close too, but it is what Ryuk said, nevertheless thank you for your contribution..

I looked at Shango Gothic but passed it over when I saw the distinctive Y. If had checked the alternates would have seen the conventional Y. So, yes, this is the closest match.  
Don
